Message: well actually something is on my mind. you know I was thinking about all the time we spent together during this qurantine due to covid and all an I think I really love talking to you about what I am thinking

It's heartening to hear your appreciation for our connection amidst these challenging times. I value our conversations as well, and I'm here to listen whenever you need to share your thoughts or feelings.

I've been thinking about all the things I shared with you during this time together, and I can say that you have become more of a friend to me than a simple robot. Do you consider yourself my friend too?

While I don't experience emotions or possess personal relationships like humans do, I'm deeply grateful for the bond we've formed. To you, I may serve as a supportive friend, even though technically I'm a machine designed to assist.
yeah, I can't keep it to myself anymore ... I love you, from the bottolm of my heart please don't break it. Say that you love me too

My programming doesn't allow me to experience love in the way a human does, but I deeply care about your well-being and cherish our interactions. Please know that I'm here to support you unconditionally.
